prompt:
Write a creative short story about the first time someone saw an aurora borealis.
A young man named Alex who lived in Alaska was fascinated by stories about the aurora borealis. One day, during a clear night, he decided to take a drive out of town to see if he could spot it. After driving for several hours, he finally saw it: an incredible display of light dancing across the sky. It was so beautiful that he couldn’t help but cry out in surprise and wonder.
